description:
This 1/2 hour course will take your pictures from being ordinary to extra-ordinary.

From high-end DSLR's down to Box Brownie - Taking brilliant photos has nothing to do with the equipment you have.

It is all down to you - the photographer!

Despite the many books and courses out there, hardly any discuss the elements that actually make a picture great.

It is true that exposure, depth of field and techniques like using foreground interest and rule of thirds are vitally important; but none of these techniques guarentee a great shot.

The techniques learned in this course, along with the skills you may already know will raise your photography to a much higher level.

The course starts by looking at the pictures you see daily. The pictures that generate income for photographers. What makes these shots better than yours? Why do picture editors choose these shots? What are you currently missing with yours? What needs to change?

Once you understand the secret elements professional pictures have, you will learn how to include these into your own shots. You will learn the techniques through many examples and experience the results immediately - and by taking this course, you should never take a bad picture again!
title: Taking better pictures
